metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3917 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The fingerprint login feature in Android 6.0.1 before 2016-10-01 and 7.0before 2016-10-01 does not track the user account during the authenticationprocess, which allows physically proximate attackers to authenticate as anarbitrary user by leveraging lockscreen access, aka internal bug 30744668.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
